text: Hari Chand Middha (1942–2018) was an Indian politician who was a member of the Haryana Legislative Assembly from the Indian National Lok Dal representing the Jind constituency in Haryana. He defeated Mange Ram Gupta who was Cabinet Minister of Haryana in 2009 in the very start of his political career. In 2014 Vidhan Sabha Polls, he again won from this constituency. Earlier, He has worked in Indian Army. Middha died on 26 August 2018 from a heart attack. == References == Category:Members of the Haryana Legislative Assembly Category:21st-century Indian politicians Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Indian National Lok Dal politicians Category:People from Jind
title: Hari Chand Middha
